header: The King of Peace Is Coming

verse: At that time the new king from the family of Jesse will stand as a banner for the people. The nations will come together around him. And the place where he lives will be filled with glory.

At that time the Lord will again reach out and take his people who are left alive. These are Godâ€™s people who are left alive in Assyria, North Egypt, South Egypt, Cush, Elam, Babylonia, Hamath and all the islands of the sea.
